definitions: Directs the course of a ship, aircraft, or other vehicle or vessel, especially by using instruments or maps.
Travels on or through water, air, or land.
Moves through or across an area or place.
Guides or directs someone or something in a particular direction.
Deals with or manages a difficult or complex situation.
examples: The captain navigates the ship through the storm.
She navigates the complex legal system with ease.
The software navigates users to their desired destination.
He navigates the crowded streets on his bicycle.
The deer navigates the dense forest.
